description: In a relaxed fit, the No Sweat Short is crafted in their bestselling stretch fabric that's designed to feel like your sweats with 5-pocket detailing for polished versatility. Plant-based fibres offer moisture wicking and antibacterial properties for all day comfort on hot weather days.
name: Duer No Sweat Relaxed Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 62% Cotton, 34% Tencel™ Lyocell, 3% Lycra® T400® Polyester, 1% Lycra® Spandex
